name: Strategic Policies & Land Allocation
notes:
Policy SP6 to delivers 10,440 dwellings over the period 2011-2031, but for housing provision period is extended to 2034 with 522 DPA over 23 years.

Trajectory:
2011/12 to 2018/19 - 400 dwellings per annum
2019/20 to 2023/24 - 485 dwellings per annum
2024/25 to 2028/29 - 685 dwellings per annum
2029/30 to 2030/31 - 695 dwellings per annum

Beyond the Plan period (2011-31) the annualised average rate of 522 dwellings has been rolled forward to cover a longer trajectory of 23 years.

name: Oxford Local Plan 2036
notes:
Stepped Trajectory: the housing requirement per annum reflects a stepped trajectory, as follows:
2016/17 to 2020/21: 475 dpa
2021/22 to 2035/36: 567 dpa.  

Unmet Need:
The Local Plans for the other Oxfordshire districts are delivering 14,300 dwellings to meet Oxford’s unmet need, as follows:
Cherwell Local Plan Partial Review: Oxford’s unmet
needs - 4,400 dwellings (Plan submitted March 2018; Examination Autumn 2018);
South Oxfordshire Local Plan 2033 - 4,950 dwellings (Plan yet to be submitted submitted March 2019);
Vale of White Horse Local Plan Part 2
2,200 dwellings (Examination July 2018);
West Oxfordshire Local Plan 2,750 dwellings (Adopted September 2018).
Total provision towards Oxford’s unmet needs by
2031 = 14,300 dwellings.

name: Lewes District Local Plan: Joint Core Strategy
notes:
Previous contention of housing number and HDT figure in part due to planning overlap with South Downs. After request, housing target revised to 5,494 (275 annualised) by MHCLG. Description of previous issue below:

Requirement for Lewes based on the total requirement of 6,900 homes for Lewes and South Downs, set out in Spatial Policy 1, minus the part of the requirement to be met in South Downs; defined by Mr Justice Lay as 1,177 homes in Wealden District Council v Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government, Lewes District Council and South Downs National Park Authority [2017] EWHC 35 1, which quashed the part of Spatial Policy 1 relating to South Downs National Park.
